thread.section_title: CMO Today - Marketing and Media News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Chipotle CEO Says No to Breakfast, Yes to Longer Hours

author: Julie Jargon
title: Chipotle CEO Says No to Breakfast, Yes to Longer Hours

organizations.name: longer hours chipotle mexican grill inc.

text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc.’s new chief executive said his recipe for reviving the burrito maker is simple: focus on improving the fast service and relatively simple menu that made the chain so popular to begin with.
Brian Niccol said in an interview on Thursday that he is taking a measured approach to turning around Chipotle’s business after more than two years of weak sales in the wake of food-safety and customer service problems.
...
